name: teknium/OpenHermes-2.5
description: The OpenHermes-2.5 dataset serves as the foundation for the OpenHermes 2.5 and Nous Hermes 2 models, which have pushed the boundaries of state-of-the-art language models (LLMs) in recent months. This dataset is a meticulously curated collection of open-source datasets and custom-created synthetic datasets, contributing significantly to the advancements in these models. The dataset, available on Hugging Face, boasts a vast scale, diverse range, and high-quality compilation, with over 1 million synthetically generated instruction and chat samples.
citeAs: @misc{OpenHermes 2.5,   title = {OpenHermes 2.5: An Open Dataset of Synthetic Data for Generalist LLM Assistants},   author = {Teknium},   year = {2023},   publisher = {HuggingFace},   url = {https://huggingface.co/datasets/teknium/OpenHermes-2.5} }
creator: teknium
keywords: Synthetic datasets, GPT-4, Distillation Compilation, LLM, Open source datasets
task: Text generation, Question answering, Dialogue systems
